63 -    def test_bit_of_word(self): 

64          for i in range(BIT_COUNT): 
65              testword = 1<<i 
66              for j in range(BIT_COUNT): 
67                  if j==i:                                 
68                      self.assertTrue(bit_of_word(testword, j)) 
69                  else: 
70                      self.assertFalse(bit_of_word(testword, j))
